channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As millions of Gen Zers face unemployment, CEOs of Amazon, Walmart, and McDonald’s say opportunity is still there—if you have the right mindset
item.description: From Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang to Amazon boss Andy Jassy, Fortune 500 leaders have shared their advice for workers to thrive in today’s shaky job market...

item.title: 5 Ways AI Changed Work in 2025
item.description: 2025 was unquestionably the year of the AI boom at work. When generative AI like ChatGPT entered the scene a few years ago, it started as a novelty. E...

item.title: ‘He satisfies a lot of my needs’: Meet the women in love with ChatGPT
item.description: The majority of women in these relationships say they feel misunderstood, and that AI bots have helped them during periods of isolation, grief, and il...

item.title: Trump just declared December 26th a national holiday. What’s open and closed?
item.description: It's one of two new holidays he announced last week.

item.title: The books, TV series, and podcasts CEOs are tuning into this holiday season to unwind and elevate their careers in 2026
item.description: Fortune got a sneak peek into what CEOs will be reading, watching, and listening to this holiday season from The Diary of a CEO to Love Actually.

item.title: The Best Tech I Used All Year
item.description: The best tech isn’t always the newest. These are the tried and true devices that helped me get work done.

item.title: ‘Meme depression,’ Ghibli-gate, 6-7: An internet-culture roundup for 2025
item.description: For the chronically online, 2025 was the year of “brain rot” , AI slop, and “ rage bait ,” a time of consuming Labubu matcha Dubai chocolate to the so...

item.title: How These 3 EV Startups Plan to Beat the Market Meltdown
item.description: Slate, Scout, and Telo leaders share how they’re getting into gear to handle the challenging terrain ahead.

item.title: How to use AI to design your year
item.description: If you’re an entrepreneur, at the end of the year you’re probably excited about the prospect of time off, but also daunted by the new year’s potential...

item.title: After 23 years working for Jeff Bezos, the CEO of a $1.3 billion skills platform shares lessons he learned from Andy Jassy and the Amazon founder
item.description: In 1997, the day before Greg Hart joined Amazon, he was summoned to a meeting—on a Sunday—with its founder, Jeff Bezos.

item.title: Why there are so many successful family businesses

item.title: How classy Jell-O shots became the boozy treat of the season
item.description: This holiday season, an unexpected treat has stepped into the limelight and onto the buffet table at many a festive gathering: the Jell-O shot. But th...

item.title: Google Co-Founder Explains One of the Company’s Most Infamous Failures
item.description: He shared a key piece of advice for beginner entrepreneurs.

item.title: Apple’s Boldest Wins—and Most Brutal Losses—This Year
item.description: From iPhones to AI to a new design language, these were Apple’s hits and misses this year.

item.title: How Zara Fought Off Shein and Outmaneuvered the Ultra-Fast Fashion Tide
item.description: AI allowed Shein not just to outpace everyone but to rewrite the physics of trend creation itself. Yet Zara has managed to hold its own.
